com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.registry

Class UIRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.registry.UIRegistry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIRegistryAmicableImpl, UIRegistryClassLoaderImpl

    public abstract class UIRegistry
extends Object
    The UIRegistry enables sharing of UIs between multiple sessions.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko
